Function Documentation

addTimestamp ( $  playerNode,
$  tagCaption,
$  value 
)

Add a timestamp to a domxml node

You can have multiple timestamp on the same xml node if the $tagCaption is different.

$playerNode is the parent node of the timestamp $tagCaption is the content of an attribute called tag $value A time value(ex 1156804212)

getTimestamp ( $  playerNode,
$  tagCaption 
)

Returns the value of a timestamp

getTimestampDateStr ( $  playerNode,
$  tagCaption 
)

Returns the timestamp in the form : dd/mm/yyyy or '-' if the timestamp was not found

getTimestampTimeStr ( $  playerNode,
$  tagCaption 
)

Returns the timestamp in the form : hh:mm or '-' if the timestamp was not found
